channel.title: Pasión de las Pasiones: Our Burning Hearts (series)
channel.description:
![netflix-la-casa-de-las-flores-kiYD--620x349%40abc|620x347](upload://92CGQ9w7Q4rBkkrmvDGRUI0Jfcc.jpeg)
Each session is scheduled for 3 hours. We will be using Streamyard. I will send an email a week ahead to confirm! This session may be recorded, depending on my Streamyard limit.
Being able to attend all sessions would be ideal, but is not required! You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
**Pasión de las Pasiones** is a PbtA tabletop role-playing game where you play the cast of the world’s most dramatic and exciting telenovela: *Pasión de las Pasiones* , as well as the family watching at home. In **Pasión de las Pasiones** , lies will be exposed, plots will be shattered, hearts will be broken, and if you’re lucky, you might even get a happy ending…at least for now.
**Safety tools** : We will be using script change, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows [The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
**Session 1** [date=2020-02-06 time=18:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lxpa_q4GeNUDHgkhaZU **Session 2** [date=2020-02-13 time=18:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxpbntW0P8m4XA1JM9I **Session 3** [date=2020-02-20 time=18:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lxpc6aDKb6qPwyPewyx **Session 4** [date=2020-02-27 time=18:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxpcJBX9c7CXghEqlFt
